overview: When a tight-knit group of hot sorority sisters realize that their new boyfriend is the same guy, the girls hatch a plan to exact revenge. As they confront him, a bizarre - but tragic - turn of events occur - the two-timing Romeo winds up dead. Now the girls are faced with a dirty little secret. Can they keep it to themselves or will karma even the score?
tagline: Dirty little secrets, dirty little lies.
title: Dirty Little Secrets
